title: Rewriting SymCrypt in Rust to modernize Microsoft’s cryptographic library
content:
We're rewriting parts of Microsoft's SymCrypt cryptographic library in Rust to improve memory safety and defend against side-channel attacks, enabling formal verification while maintaining backward compatibility via a Rust-to-C compiler.
The post Rewriting SymCrypt in Rust to modernize Microsoft’s cryptographic library  appeared first on Microsoft Research.
author: Jonathan Protzenko, Samuel Lee, Samreen Khadeer, Son Ho, Oleksii Oleksenko, Michael Naehrig, Cédric Fournet
